Gentlemen, the most interesting thing just happened with this spoon.
Yeah, I picked it up without thinking about it. Which raises a neuroscientific question, when did I decide to pick it up?

Amy is studying the time lag between intent and awareness, and I realized that applies to the measurement problem in quantum mechanics. Now, I recognize there will be a time lag between me saying that and you Googling what it means, so I’ll wait.
Well, don’t get me wrong. Neurobiology’s nothing more than the science of gray squishy stuff. But, you know, when it connects to physics, gas up the Ford, Martha, we’re going for a drive.
